scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:json"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:json"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.docker:reset: docker-compose down && docker volume rm sancheznogueira_mongodb_data && docker-compose up --build
